name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Google Spectrum Database
description: This is a repository of google spectrum database APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google Spectrum Database
apis.description: The Google Spectrum Database API provides PAWS-compatible JSON-RPC methods that allow devices to query the database to find available TV-band spectrum at a given geolocation.
